 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחַב‎</span>] **verb** ==drag== (***Imperfect*** consecutive 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ואסחב‎</span> [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>18</sup>, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ואסחבה‎</span> Ib<sup>12.13</sup>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סחב‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>328</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְסָחַ֫בְנוּ‎</span> consecutive [[2Sam.17.13|2Sam 17:13]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסְחָבוּם‎</span> [[Jer.49.20|Jer 49:20]]; [[Jer.50.45|Jer 50:45]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָחוֺב‎</span> [[Jer.22.19|Jer 22:19]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִסְחֹב‎</span> [[Jer.15.3|Jer 15:3]] — ***drag***, a city <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַדהַֿנַּחַל‎</span> [[2Sam.17.13|2Sam 17:13]], corpses [[Jer.15.3|Jer 15:3]]; [[Jer.22.19|Jer 22:19]], captives, under figure of sheep dragged off by wild beast [[Jer.49.20|Jer 49:20]] = [[Jer.50.45|Jer 50:45]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] passive, whence [[BDB#Schw|Schw]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] suppose a **Niph\`al** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסָּחֲבוּ‎</span>).
